article.title: Census Bureau Webinars - Freight Forward
article.summary: Watch a webinar from the US Census Bureau to learn about Freight Forward, including what it is and what is needed to participate.
article.content:
â€‹What is a Freight Forwarder?

These videos presented by the U.S. Census Bureau:

What is a Freight Forwarder? Part 1 (3:31 mins)

  • Pro Forma Invoice
  • Help you Ship Economically
  • Help you Ship Safely
  • Ship in Compliance with U.S. export laws
  • International Transportation Department

What is a Freight Forwarder? Part 2 (2:33 mins)

  • Letter of Credit
  • Commercial Invoice
  • Processing the Bill of Lading
  • Finding a Freight Forwarder
article.seometadatadescription: Watch a webinar from the US Census Bureau to learn about Freight Forward, including what it is and what is needed to participate.
article.seometadatakeyword: freight forward, census bureau, export training, webinar
